short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically categorize and label files in commit histories and pull requests based on predefined rules with FileChangeCategorizer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FileChangeCategorizer is a Chrome extension that enhances your GitHub experience by automatically categorizing and labeling files in commit histories and pull requests. This tool helps you maintain an organized and efficient workflow by applying predefined rules to your file changes, making it easier to manage large codebases and ensure consistency across your projects.
